feed.title: Coding Cat
feed.subtitle: A blog created in an attempt toward knowledge propagation and systematization. Mostly IT-related stuff.

entry.title: Wafers
entry.content: Wafer (slice, substrate) - is a slice of semiconductor used in fabrication of integrated circuits and solar cells.
entry.summary: Wafer (slice, substrate) - is a slice of semiconductor used in fabrication of integrated circuits and solar cells.
